uk.co.matdev.SIMOnline.core

Interface GraphicsImp

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphicsImpSlick2d

    public interface GraphicsImp

    This is a Graphics implementation interface that is meant to be sub classed to provide implementations of how to draw to the screen in different ways.

    There is also a notion of of a part Rectangle2d of the screen which it is valid to draw on it is up to the subclasses to choose to inforce this

      • setValidRectangle

        void setValidRectangle(Rectangle2d validRectangle)
        Parameters:
        validRectangle - This is a rectangle in which the graphics should be drawn.

      • drawRectangle

        void drawRectangle(float x,
                   float y,
                   float width,
                   float height,
                   boolean filled)
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the bottom left corner of the rectangle
        y - The y position of the bottom left corner of the rectangle
        width - The width of the rectangle
        height - The height of the rectangle
        filled - Whether the rectangle should be filled
